titles.title: Veterans Day Moment of Silence Act
A bill to amend title 36, United States Code, to encourage the nationwide observance of two minutes of silence each Veterans Day.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
4/16/2015--Introduced. Veterans Day Moment of Silence Act
Directs the President to issue an annual proclamation calling on the people of the United States to observe two minutes of silence on Veterans Day, beginning at 3:11 p.m. Atlantic standard time, in honor of the service and sacrifice of veterans throughout the history of the nation.
